= Linux =

=== Terminal Commands ===
*NOTE*: *{}* is a parameter

* Rename file:
  * mv *{Options}* source destination
  * Ex. mv originalName newName
* Check if service is running:
  * service *{service}* status
* Start service:
  * sudo systemctl start *{service}*

=== Bash ===

* Variables:
  * Variable=Value
* Print date
{{{bash
echo $(date) 
}}}
